version_name: 1.1.0* Works with PowerTeacher Pro* Modifications to and ability to shut off trending indicators* Improved notifications
1.1.2* Works with PowerSchool 10.0 features* Modifications to and ability to shut off trending indicators* Improved notifications* Resolved remaining stability issues

version_description:
What's New in Version 1.1.0
* Works with PowerTeacher Pro
* Modifications to and ability to shut off trending indicators
* Improved notifications

What's New in Version 1.1.1
* Works with PowerSchool 10.0 features
* Modifications to and ability to shut off trending indicators
* Improved notifications
* Resolved stability issue on startup

What's New in Version 1.1.2
* Works with PowerSchool 10.0 features
* Modifications to and ability to shut off trending indicators
* Improved notifications
* Resolved remaining stability issues

The PowerSchool Mobile App now delivers easier access to important student information and improved performance and reliability! This new version also features an updated and customizable dashboard that leads the way in accessibility.

The PowerSchool Mobile App now delivers easier access to important student information and improved performance and reliability! This new version also features an updated and customizable dashboard that leads the way in accessibility.
This release includes bug fixes and stability improvements.
This release includes bug fixes and stability improvements.

* New Grid on the Classes tab that provides quick access to grades for all terms and classes!
* New Assignment Status Widget on the Dashboard.
* Ability to change the navigation tab order under the More tab by tapping the edit button on the iPhone/i

This release provides a key enhancement that allows you to choose which scheduling term appears in the Class Overview, as well as resolutions to multiple issues related to incorrect data appearing within the application.
